title: [Large-Scale] Effective Interaction Strategies in Self-Paced Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platform usage and smartphone utilization
context.additional_context: Learning interaction strategies using asynchronous communication tools in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment. Project-based assessments measure learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners can organize weekly learning content into three or more posts using asynchronous communication tools (blogs, forums, etc.)
Learners can share learning content two or more times through informal interactions with peer learners (comments, reaction emojis, etc.)
Learners can provide feedback on project topics at least once by utilizing interaction strategies learned in online real-time sessions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
